column2: BRIEF-Mercury General Corp Announces Quarterly Loss Per Share $0.77 April 30 (Reuters) - Mercury General Corp: * MERCURY GENERAL CORPORATION ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER RESULTS AND DECLARES QUARTERLY DIVIDEND * MERCURY GENERAL CORP QUARTERLY OPERATING INCOME PER SHARE $ 0.07 * MERCURY GENERAL CORP - QTRLY NET PREMIUMS EARNED OF $808.1 MILLION VERSUS $789.8 MILLION * MERCURY GENERAL CORP QUARTERLY TOTAL REVENUES $783.2 MILLION VERSUS $847.5 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
